name: Dragon Rising
description: Kill the dragon that is attacking the Western Watchtower. This is your first encounter with a dragon and marks the beginning of your journey as the Dragonborn.

name: Bleak Falls Barrow
description: Retrieve the Dragonstone from Bleak Falls Barrow. This ancient Nordic ruin holds the key to understanding dragon burial sites across Skyrim.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23555555%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚ö∞Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: The Way of the Voice
description: Learn the secrets of the Thu'um from the Greybeards at High Hrothgar. Climb the 7,000 steps to reach the monastery and begin your training in the Way of the Voice.
objectives: Climb the 7,000 steps to High Hrothgar
Learn the Word of Power from Einarth
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cccccc%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22%23333333%22%3E‚õ∞Ô∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: A Chance Arrangement
description: Help Brynjolf in Riften's marketplace. Frame Brand-Shei and prove your worth to join the Thieves Guild.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23333333%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüóùÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Take Up Arms
description: Join the Companions, Skyrim's most renowned group of warriors. Prove your worth in combat and become one of the Circle.
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23cc6600%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3E‚öîÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: First Lessons
description: Join the College of Winterhold and begin your magical education. Demonstrate your magical aptitude to gain entry.
objectives: Reach the Hall of the Elements
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%2399ccff%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22%23003366%22%3EüîÆ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Diplomatic Immunity
description: Infiltrate the Thalmor Embassy to discover what they know about the dragons. Sneak through their headquarters and find evidence of their involvement.
objectives: Search for information about the dragons
imagePath: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns=%22http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22%3E%3Crect fill=%22%23996633%22 width=%22300%22 height=%22200%22/%3E%3Ctext x=%2250%25%22 y=%2250%25%22 font-size=%2240%22 text-anchor=%22middle%22 dominant-baseline=%22middle%22 fill=%22white%22%3EüïµÔ∏è%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Alduin's Wall
description: Discover the ancient secrets of Alduin's Wall with Esbern and Delphine. Learn how the ancient Nords defeated Alduin in ages past.
objectives: Gain entrance to Sky Haven Temple
Learn the secret of Alduin's Wall

name: The Wolf Queen Awakened
description: The spirit of Potema, the Wolf Queen, is stirring in the catacombs beneath Solitude. Put her restless spirit to rest once and for all.

name: Dragonslayer
description: Enter Sovngarde and defeat Alduin once and for all. Join forces with the ancient heroes of Nordic legend to save the world from the World-Eater.
